channel.title: Auto Restarter?
channel.description: Can any1 tell me how to add a auto-restarter for my server?

item.title: Auto Restarter?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Razor69, post:12, topic:260253”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=343610.msg2653811#msg2653811 date=1233705303]

then dont post unless u gonna help him

Why the hell should I help everyone with their stupid common sense-solving problems? It’s just as easy to google “Voule Auto Restarter” as it is to spam these forums by posting about it.

if they werent idiots
their servers wouldn’t need “auto-restarters”
so you can just fuck off.

We’re not talking about making stable servers you fucking idiot! All he asked about was an auto restarter! Stop being the biggest dick in the world!

Stop being the biggest idiot in the world!

You have nothing smart to say because you know I’m right! Stop cutting this guy down! All you had to say was “search for it” but I don’t know why you’re being a fuckg dick!
[/quote]
ur
not
right[/quote]

I’m done with you dude. You’re not even worth yelling at. I don’t even know you. You must be satisfied with yourself that you won a fight over the internet. That’s good for you, congratulations. Goodbye.

Read full topic
